A Weather Image for the App Weather

Welcome to DVTs Weather App.


From the Main Menu you will be given an option to View Today's Weather by pressing the View Weather Button, which will take you to another Screen, where you will be able to see the Current Maximum and Minimum Weather for the Current Day, also you will be able to see Today's Date and Time, as well as your Current Location.

From the Main Menu, you can also Press on the Help Button, which will bring you to this Screen, where it will give you information on how to use this Application.

On the Main Menu you can Press the Exit Button to Close the Application.


Thank You for using this Application, Have a Great Day.
